name: Pottery
description: Pottery is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real potter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of pottery: the selection and preparation of clay, the creation of a workpiece blank, the processes of drying, painting, firing and glazing the product. The player is invited to make a jug or a bowl step by step, choose a pattern and color for the product to your taste, paint, bake and glaze the product. The owner of the workshop will help you go through all the stages of manufacturing, who throughout the game will tell you what and how to do, as well as some interesting facts about pottery. To get acquainted with the features of management, a training mode is provided.
